author: archyde
title: Hombli pack on sale, a connected doorbell + a WiFi chime - Archyde
text: 2023-12-28 12:37:52 Don’t let any visit go unnoticed with the exclusive pack of the Hombli 1080p connected doorbell and WiFi Chime. Thanks to an exclusive 7% promotion, you can now acquire this intelligent security duo. Transform your front door into a sophisticated checkpoint with 1080p Full HD video. Smart monitoring with the Hombli connected doorbell The Hombli 1080p Connected Doorbell ensures complete monitoring of your home, Day and night. Its extended viewing angle of 140° and its Full HD video resolution guarantee optimal coverage. Instant notifications on your Smartphone keep you informed of any presence detected at your door. This feature provides complete peace of mind. Improved communication with WiFi chime Facilitate your exchanges with your visitors thanks to two-way audio function. The pack also includes a WiFi Chime, so you don’t miss a bell, wherever you are in your home. With ease of installation and long reach, the chime offers maximum flexibility to be placed in any room. Exclusive offer with 7% discount Take advantage of the 7% promotion today and ensure clear communication and enhanced security with the Hombli 1080p connected doorbell and the WiFi Chime. Take advantage now of this exclusive promotion for only 138.99 euros instead of 149.95 euros. In addition, with the ease of payment, pay 3 times including 46.33 euros per installment, and ensure unparalleled security and comfort with Hombli. Personalized storage and easy connection with the Hombli app Save your Full HD 1080p videos to a micro SD card up to 128 GB for additional security. For maximum convenience, opt for cloud storage with the paid service. Take full advantage of the potential of this intelligent duo with the Hombli app on Android or iOS. This app allows you to stay connected to your home at all times. The advantages of a connected doorbell Personalized security A connected doorbell offers personalized security which allows you to constantly monitor your front door. With features like motion detection, night vision and two-way communication, you can verify the identity of your visitors and deter intruders, even from a distance. This brings peace of mind, and also strengthens your home security system in an intelligent and accessible way. In addition, the doorbell is easy to install and configure, discover through this video how to configure a smart doorbell. [Read more: 'But where are they going?': Scientists discover a strange pattern of movement repeated by sharks, penguins and turtles](https://www.archyde.com/but-where-are-they-going-scientists-discover-a-strange-pattern-of-movement-repeated-by-sharks-penguins-and-turtles/) Comfort of interaction Beyond security, a connected doorbell improves your interaction experience with your visitors. Two-way communication lets you talk to delivery people, guests, and family members, even when you’re not at home. This makes interactions more fluid, and also facilitates receiving packages and managing visitswhile adding a layer of convenience to your daily life. 1703816668 #Hombli #pack #sale #connected #doorbell #WiFi #chime
